content: it is the spookiest time of the year and it is time to crochet some spooktacular home decor for halloween that your family will cherish for years to come > free pattern can be found on the blog- click here 1 crochet yourself a spider gnome with a spooky eyeball spider it is never too early to start and be ready for the halloween rush easy to crochet basic gnome with a tiny or not spider that you can customize with your own colors or why not make it all in black materials sport/ fine weight yarn- yarn art jeans 55% cotton 45% acryl 50 g 160 m in colors- black color 10 gr white color 25gr light grey color 20 gr fuchsia color 25gr a small amount of beige for the nose crochet hook size 2 5mm poly fiber fill for stuffing tapestry needle 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/spider-halloween-gnome-free-crochet-pattern/
